english.segment1: I settle down a twisted up frown. Disguised as a smile, well, you would have never known. I had it all, but not what I wanted. 'Cause hope for me was a place uncharted and overgrown
english.segment2: You'd make your way in. I'd resist you just like this. You can't tell me to feel. The truth never set me free. So I did it myself
english.segment3: You can't be too careful anymore. When all that is waiting for you. Won't come any closer. You've got to reach out a little more. More, more, more, more
english.segment4: Open your eyes like I open mine. It's only the real world, life you will never know. Shifting your way to throw off the pain. Well, you can ignore it, but only for so long
english.segment5: You look like I did. You resist me just like this. You can't tell me to heal. And it hurts remembering. How it felt to shut down
english.segment6: Can't be too careful anymore. When all that is waiting for you. Won't come any closer. You've got to reach out a little more. More, more, more, more
english.segment7: The truth never set me free. The truth never set me free. The truth never set me free. So I'll do it myself
english.segment8: You can't be too careful anymore. When all that is waiting for you. Won't come any closer. You've got to reach out
english.segment9: Can't be too careful anymore. When all that is waiting for you. You won't come any closer. You've got to reach out more. More, more, more, more
